table.style: border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top;

tr.style: border: 1px #F0F0F0 solid; font-size: 11px; font-family: verdana; vertical-align: top

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

a.title: The logical name of the element

th.style: vertical-align: top; text-align : var(--ig-left,left); background-color: white; border: 0px #F0F0F0 solid; padding:0px 4px 0px 4px; padding-top: 3px; padding-bottom: 3px

description.value: Logical Model for representing Decision-Support Logic from a DAK. Decision-support logic and algorithms to support appropriate service delivery in accordance with WHO clinical, public health and data use guidelines.

definition.value: Logical Model for representing Decision-Support Logic from a DAK. Decision-support logic and algorithms to support appropriate service delivery in accordance with WHO clinical, public health and data use guidelines.
An identifier for the decision support logic
Description of the decision support logic - either Markdown content or a URI to a Markdown file (absolute or relative to repository root)
Link to a DMN file containing the decision logic. Source URI could be absolute or relative to the root of the DAK
